description: The Federal Government of Canada is publishing this solicitation in response to a existing requirement for the provision of courier and freight services for commercial goods. :this solicitation seeks proposals to issue Standing Offers for the provision of commercial goods courier service.
full_summary:
### **Courier and Freight Services**
###  **Service de messagerie et la transportation**
#### Reference Number
WS4113053391-Doc4372232730

#### Solicitation Number
WS4113053391

#### Publication Date
2023-12-30

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
2024-02-19 (2:00 PM ET)

#### Expected Contract Start Date
Effective April 1, 2024

#### Proposed Procurement Category
Services (SRV)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer (Demande d'offre à commandes)

#### Addresses
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Canada

#### Contact Information
Kevin Jiang
Minister des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC/PSPC)
kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description
The Federal Government of Canada, on behalf of its various Departments, Agencies, and Crown Corporations, seeks proposals to issue Standing Offers for the provision of courier and freight services for commercial goods by air and/or ground from one city to another in Canada and worldwide.

**Scope of Services**
Services will include:
* Intra-city courier services within the National Capital Region (NCR)
* Freight services from one city to another in Canada and worldwide
* Services will be provided on an "as and when requested" basis

**Excluded Services**
* Intra-city courier services within cities other than the NCR
* Letter mail services
* Open-deck specialized transportation services
* Transportation of military equipment and materials that require DND specific regulations

**Trade Agreements**
The contract will be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)**
78140000 - Transport services

** regions of operational delivery**
The proposed contract will have a global scope, thus the delivery will take place within Canada, as well as internationally

Please note that this notice expires and the tender is closed to new bids. Hence you should revisit other tender announcements put out by government of Canada. If there're any confusion, plz do not hesitate to reach out to Kevin Jiang of Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). 

The that you provide will be formatted
